data.expected_result: You jump to the system message and it highlights
data.short_description: Jumping to a system message doesn't jump to the message
data.steps_to_repro: - Pin a message in a channel - Send some messages after the system pin message till the system pin message is out of view (just so you can see that it isn't jumping) - Open Search and search "in: {current channel}" - Scroll down in Search and find the system pin message - Press the Jump button on it
